data.description: Perform nmap scans using OO perl
data.similar:
Found one author who started an Nmap wrapper but never released it
    ... talked to him and he had no problems with my work.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is my second application for a namespace ... last one was in
    December and I never heard from anyone . .. I have now uploaded my
    files so I hope I hear from someone this time about this.

    nmap is a well-known program among network types and my module is
    program-specific so i figured a top-level Nmap would work well ..
    also, the Scanner works nicely as there are other (not yet realeased
    to CPAN) module sets for use with nmap that start with the Nmap
    top-level token .. e.g.

    Nmap::Diff

    Max
